h1_title: Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough
content: There are multiple things to consider if you're struggling with this portion of the fight, such as taking in the Fire Vessel to help protect against burn damage, and the Body-Cooling and Body-Warming Powders we mentioned earlier.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Water_Curtain_Cave_and_Birthstone_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Water Curtain Cave and Birthstone Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Birthstone - Heart of Birthstone' and the sub-subsection 'Stone Monkey Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
There are multiple things to consider if you're struggling with this portion of the fight, such as taking in the Fire Vessel to help protect against burn damage, and the Body-Cooling and Body-Warming Powders we mentioned earlier.
